titles.title: Railroad Antitrust and Competition Enhancement Act of 2005
Railroad Antitrust and Competition Enhancement Act of 2005
To amend the Clayton Act to restore the application of the antitrust laws to rail carriers; and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: Railroad Antitrust and Competition Enhancement Act of 2005 - Amends the Clayton Act to eliminate the antitrust exemption applicable to railroads.
